Detailed Description

Where actual Computed Tomography and Tomosynthesis reconstruction is done.

const std::string &  in 
)

Converts the string "in" into the Filter _val. To be used in the CLI parsing via "poptmx" library.

Parameters:
_valvalue to be updated.
instring to be parsed.
Returns:
true if success, false otherwise.

long KERNEL_API nof_threads ( long  _threads = 0)

Number of threads for the process.

Parameters:
_threadsRequested number of threads (0 for auto).
Returns:
Number of threads for the architecture where the process is running if automatic number of threads was requested and just _threads if set in stone.

void KERNEL_API ts_add ( Map &  projection,
Map &  result,
const Filter &  filter,
const float  center,
const Contrast  contrast,
const float  angle,
const int  plane 
)

Add one projection to the TS image.

The projection array is modified during the reconstruction: each line in the array is filtered (and converted to the field if refraction contrast is in use).

Parameters:
projectionArray with the projection (filtered projection on exit).
resultResulting array.
filterFourier filter.
centerdeviation of the rotation axis from the center of the sinogram.
contrastType of contrast
angleAngle at which the projection was recorded.
planePlane of the reconstruction.
